column6:
Twelve years have passed since Joel Flood stood trial for a murder that devastated an entire community. Now Matt Murdock must face the consequences of his role as Flood's defense attorney. Once again the shadow of death hangs over Redemption Valley, and it may already be too late to prevent another ritual slaying.,2005,8
32 PGS./ Parental Advisory ...$2.99
column8: | penciller:Michael Gaydos | writer:David Hine | colorist:Lee Loughridge | letterer:Cory Petit | penciller (cover):Bill Sienkiewicz
